text: The Mad Day, or The Marriage of Figaro is a play by Pierre Beaumarchais. It is a comedy. It was written in 1778, and first published in 1785. Figaro was first performed at the Théâtre Français in Paris on 27 April 1784. It was a great success. The Marriage of Figaro is a sequel to the play, The Barber of Seville, and a prequel to The Guilty Mother. ==Related pages== * The Marriage of Figaro (1786), an opera by Mozart based on the play Category:18th-century plays Category:1780s works Category:1785 Category:French plays
